messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR DAVID MEIKLE
messages.content:
Experienced - David has the political experience to be your new MSP. David represents Pollokshields Ward on the Council and works hard all year round standing up for local people.
Activist - David is actively campaigning in the community to make the local area cleaner, greener, and safer. David wants to give you the chance to demonstrate what he could achieve as your MSP.
Common sense - David will be a strong, common sense voice in the parliament. So this is your chance to elect someone who will be a passionate representative for Glasgow Southside.

issues.environment: David is actively campaigning in the community to make the local area cleaner, greener, and safer.

politicalExperience.achievements: Works hard all year round standing up for local people.

contactInformation.address: Glasgow Southside Conservatives, 10 Clincart Road, Glasgow G42 9DZ

leaflet.additionalNotes: The image of the leaflet is rotated, making the text appear upside down.
